---
id: GetListOfCurrencyAssets
title: 获取币种资产列表
sidebar_label: 获取币种资产列表
sidebar_position: 3
---

**类型：** GET **描述：** `/spot/v4/balances`

### 参数

| 名称 | 类型 | 是否必需 | 默认值 | 描述 | 范围 |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| currencies | string | 否 |  | 币种列表，以逗号分隔，例如：usdt,btc |  |

### 注意事项

#### **限流规则**

10次/秒/apikey

### 响应示例

```json title="响应"
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "totalBtcAmount": 0,
    "assets": [
      {
        "currency": "string",
        "currencyId": 0,
        "frozenAmount": 0,
        "availableAmount": 0,
        "totalAmount": 0,
        "convertBtcAmount": 0
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
